#summary Getting Started with download and play!!

  # Download distribution archive
  # Unzip the downloaded file some location (e.g c:/demo)
    * _note: if unzip tool prompts for overwrite files, ignore_
  # Start Activiti Karaf - cd to bin directory in unziped folder
{{{
C:\demo\activiti-karaf-dist-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT\bin>karaf
                   _   _       _ _   _
         /\       | | (_)     (_) | (_)
        /  \   ___| |_ ___   ___| |_ _
       / /\ \ / __| __| \ \ / / | __| |
      / ____ \ (__| |_| |\ V /| | |_| |
     /_/    \_\___|\__|_| \_/ |_|\__|_|

  Activiti Karaf (1.0.0-SNAPSHOT)

Hit '<tab>' for a list of available commands
and '[cmd] --help' for help on a specific command.
Hit '<ctrl-d>' or 'osgi:shutdown' to shutdown Activiti Karaf.

karaf@root> 
}}}
  # Run [ActCLI Activiti CLI] commands
{{{
karaf@root> act:list
}}}
